titleStmt.title: The seven women confessors, or A discovery of the seuen white divels which liued at Queen-Street in Coven-Garden. Viz. Katherine Wels, Susan Baker, Anne Parker, Katherine Smith, Elinor Hall, Mary Iones, Dorathy Marsh. Whose articles are herein declared, and their mad pranks presented to the view of the world. Discovered by Iohn Stockden a yeoman. Jan. 22. 1641.
titleStmt.author: Stockden, John.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Thomason Collection, and Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
